## PayflowLinkToken interface

Contains information used to generate PayPal iframe for transaction. Applies to Payflow Link and Payments Advanced payment methods.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface PayflowLinkToken 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [mode?](./magento-api.payflowlinktoken.mode.md) | Maybe&lt;[PayflowLinkMode](./magento-api.payflowlinkmode.md)<!-- -->&gt; | <i>(Optional)</i> Mode for Payflow transaction |
|  [paypal\_url?](./magento-api.payflowlinktoken.paypal_url.md) | Maybe&lt;Scalars\['String'\]&gt; | <i>(Optional)</i> PayPal URL used for requesting Payflow form |
|  [secure\_token\_id?](./magento-api.payflowlinktoken.secure_token_id.md) | Maybe&lt;Scalars\['String'\]&gt; | <i>(Optional)</i> Secure token ID generated by PayPal |
|  [secure\_token?](./magento-api.payflowlinktoken.secure_token.md) | Maybe&lt;Scalars\['String'\]&gt; | <i>(Optional)</i> Secure token generated by PayPal |
